types:type.name: customer_object_example
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type customer_object_example = {| customerId: String, lastName: String, firstName: String, phoneNumber: String, emailId: String, SSN: String |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"customerId\":\"1\",\"lastName\":\"Neerukonda\",\"firstName\":\"Aswani\",\"phoneNumber\":\"8328561368\",\"emailId\":\"aswanineerukonda@gmail.com\",\"SSN\":\"123-45-6789\"}"}
